name: V_EHI_CLM_FILTER_STATIC
description: This view supports extracting rich text format (RTF) data for EHI from the claim information masterfile.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the claim or claim information record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient or member associated with the claim or claim information record.

columns.name: CM_LOG_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance from which this record or line was extracted. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
